high_descs: Look down and turn around and walk to the bed. Turn to the right and go towards the table next to the bed.
Pick up the pen on the table.
Raise it up turn to the right and go to the end of the table turning left to face the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pen on the table to turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Turn and face the night stand next to the bed.
Pick the pen up from the left side of the night stand.
Move right, to the right side if the night stand.
anns.task_desc: Turn a light on with a pen in hand.

high_descs: Move to the night stand on the right side of the bed
Pick up the black pen on the far left side of the night stand
While holding the pen, face the lamp on top of the night stand to your left
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a pen
